Summary: Triangular shaped craft with flsshing red and white lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is an update to the report that I filed on the 19th or 20th of November 2008. In that report I had stated that I estimated the date of the sighting to be around September 11, 2008 (because I had deleted the report I had typed into my computer). I was just able to confirm that the date was actually September 4, 2008 at 9:15 pm, not September 11, 2008. Thought you might like to have the exact date.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There was one other sighting in Modesto on or around September 4th 2008
